{/* */}

About Me

I graduated from Cornell University with an Information Science (HCI) major, Computer Science and Psychology minors.

I love learning, and get giddily excited about podcasts, Maria Popova's inspiring life lessons, and Atlas Obscura's latest obscure discoveries.

I love creating and making things. I drool over beautiful illustrations, photos, videos, DIY's, architecture, any form of creative expressions really. I want to learn them all! At the moment, I'm focused on ballet and watercolor!

Laugh, dance, travel, read, live life to the fullest. I don't sleep enough, but I dream.

Work History

Gusto Product Designer — 1.5 years
I design, code, and do everything in between to create a delightful product that our users love!

Quantcast Senior User Experience Designer — 2.5 years
I solved data visualization problems, from user research, information architecture, wireframes, interactive prototypes, to visual design, style guide and front-end development.

Apple User Experience Designer — 3 years
I designed and prototyped enterprise software for iPhone, iPad and desktop.

Apple Front-end UI Engineer — 1 year
I made sure the Apple Online Store was fast, interactive, and pixel-perfect.

Cornell University Web Developer/Designer — 3 years
I designed and developed websites for a variety of school organizations.

Expertise

  • Interaction Design
  • Visual Design
  • Product Strategy
  • Concepting
  • User Research
  • Usability Testing
  • Prototyping
  • Spec Docs
  • Front-end Development
  • Illustration
  • Photography
  • Painting
); }
